summary:
A highly engaged Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist of successfully on-boarding and placing expert professionals across various European countries and United Kingdom. I'm committed to helping talented individuals achieve their career goals. My expertise placing qualified talent in the Information Technology, SAP Consulting, Manufacturing, Marketing and Sales, Finance, Healthcare, Pharmaceutical and miscellaneous domains space has led to win-win situations for both my candidates and clients.

I love networking with the local talent for potential hires. I’m skilled in candidate engagement and enjoy building successful partnerships. I have recruited for dozens of Fortune 500 companies on positions. In the little spare time that I get, I indulge in my passion for gaming.

Even if the timing may not right for you to make a move, I welcome getting to know you. New opportunities come across my desk all the time.

Note: Please do accept the LinkedIn connection/Inmails and respond to LinkedIn Inmails/chats in realtime for quick response and conversion of next steps.

treasury_media.title: MPower Plus Group of Companies | LinkedIn

awards.title: Star Performer / Fresher
awards.description: Received most prestigious Star Performer Award from honorable Director of Silverlink Technologies for closing 4 positions during the month of May 2016 among the whole office including global recruitment divisions.

profile_positions.description:
•	Proven experience as talent acquisition recruiter and lead.
•	Supporting client point of contacts and responsible for delivery and fulfilling their prospective requirements.
•	Responsible for leading a team of recruiters who were responsible for the staffing needs of the requirements.
•	Develop, coach and motivate recruiting team on their customer focus, recruiting expertise, completion of performance objectives and goals.
•	Understanding of all selection methods and techniques.
•	Proficient in the use of social media and job boards.
•	Working knowledge of Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) and databases.
•	Determine current staffing needs and produce forecasts.
•	Develop talent acquisition strategies and hiring plans.
•	Plan and conduct recruitment and selection processes (interviews, screening calls etc.)
•	Develop, maintain and utilize candidate database of top industry talent to ensure bench strength for key organizational positions.
•	Work closely with hiring managers to schedule and follow up on candidate selection to maximize efficiency of recruiting process.
•	Scheduling resources interview as per client's availability and blocking their calendars using Bull Horn and Ceipal ATS.
•	Organizing, tracking and recording the submitted candidate's various stages of recruitment cycle in Bull Horn ATS and Ceipal ATS.
•	Manage internal and external job posting advertisements and communications.
•	Well proficient in finding right talent using LinkedIn latest tool of LinkedIn Recruiter.
•	Validating and verifying various EU countries work permits for all non-European citizens and taking necessary steps to ensure smooth onboarding before selection process.
•	Keeping the candidate and client warm until the onboarding procedures gets completed smoothly.
•	Researching market intelligence for requirements, location and providing relevant information to client like availability and market salary range as per their request.
profile_positions.title: Senior Talent Acquisition Professional / Lead for UK/EU

profile_positions.description:
•	Thorough knowledge and experience in complete recruiting life cycle process from sourcing to onboarding for different employment types.
•	Add short-listed candidates into client databases such as Hiring Hub, Recruiter Super Market, etc.
•	Getting in touch with client point of contacts to understand their recruitment needs and performing effective strategy to fulfill their requirements.
•	Create and implement end-to-end hiring processes to ensure a positive experience for candidates
•	Develop and deploy a full cycle recruiting strategy to include pipelining of candidates, selling positions to potential candidates, networking and contacting recruiting sources.
•	Evaluating applications and screening candidates via calls or emails, as well as facilitating pre-interview assessments.
•	Source, gather and interview passive job seekers utilizing best-in-class recruitment methods (cold calling, networking, recruitment campaigns)
•	Qualified profiles are sent to respective clients for further consideration.
•	Having good Knowledge of all sorts of UK and European visas, work permits.
•	Schedule interviews (telephonic and face to face), follow-up to ensure interviews happen.
•	Worked closely and assist senior team members.
•	Prepared concisely and error-free weekly reports.
•	Participate in daily and weekly meetings to discuss the recruitment strategy to fulfill client's roles within specified time.
•	Participate in our company's strategic planning regarding employee development and engagement.
•	Research and recommend new sourcing tools and recruiting software (e.g. ATS).
•	Maintain records of all materials used for recruitment, including interview notes and related paperwork, to share with key stakeholders.
•	Source applicants through job portals like Jobsite, Total jobs, Monster UK, Indeed, Social media like LinkedIn RPS, online channels, and other professional networks.
•	Maintain talent pipelines with potential candidates and past applicants for future staffing needs.
profile_positions.title: Associate Recruiter-UK/EU

profile_positions.description:
•	Understood IT requirements of clients, resource needs and delivered qualified consultants.
•	Sourced, screened and interviewed prospective candidates from UK and Europe, perform due diligence and submit qualified candidates who were technically, commercially mapping the client needs for open job requirements.
•	Responsible for client interaction and handling requirements directly from them.
•	Attending regular meetings with the manager to discuss the details and conditions about the requirement and their hiring plan.
•	Scheduled telephonic interviews as per the client's schedule and blocking calendars.
•	Weekly meetings involving Director, Delivery Manager, Team Lead, and other recruiters to understand the business requirements and current scenario.
•	Specialized in successfully cracking and delivering resources on niche skill requirements.
•	Prepared recruitment analysis reports of one whole week and weekly meetings on RA to understand the gaps and ability to perform accordingly to meet the weekly and monthly goals.
•	Ensure proper onboarding for new hires and the necessary paperwork is completed promptly and accurately
•	Conduct preliminary interviews with recruits to gauge interest, personality and salary requirements.
•	Thorough knowledge of UK and EU work permits like Dependent visa, ILR permit, Tier-1 visa, Tier-2 visa, Permanent resident permits, Temporary resident permits, Family visa.
•	Knowledge and understanding of various geography in UK and Europe, mapping and sourcing the candidates as per the locations.
•	Performed successful on-boarding of candidates who relocated from one country to another country within Europe and from UK to Europe.
•	Sourcing the right profiles through various sources like job portals, LinkedIn RPS tool, internal database, job postings/advertisements, social media, employee referrals.
•	Achievement: Honored as Star Fresher for industrious and excellent accomplishments for the period of May 2016 – August 2016.
profile_positions.title: Technical Recruiter - UK/Europe
